```yaml
"header": string
"regex": string
"subgroup": int

```

| Field | Type | Description | Default |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |----------- | 
| `header` | `string` |  |  |
| `regex` | `string` | what information to extract. if extraction fails the result is an empty value. |  |
